pages.text: Like $(l:aoa3:bows#bows)bows$(/l), crossbows fire $(thing)arrows$() to deal ranged damage. $(thing)Crossbows$() operate by pre-loading the arrows, requiring a short loading time after which the $(thing)arrow$() sits ready in the rack.$(br2)Once you are ready to fire, the $(thing)crossbow$() will release its $(thing)arrow$() immediately, firing it in a similar manner to a standard $(l:aoa3:bows#bows)bow$(/l).
pages.title: Crossbows

pages.text: There isn't a lot to say about $(thing)crossbows$(). They deal the same kind of damage that $(l:aoa3:bows#bows)bows$(/l) do, use the same ammunition, and are used in a similar manner.$(br2)The primary difference is that crossbows allow you to prepare your shot before it is needed, freeing you up for a rapid response to any threat.
Feel like a true marksman with the power of a $(thing)crossbow$() at your side.
pages.title: A Crossbow

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)crossbows$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
